articles.title: Watch Fox News Channel Online | Stream Fox News

neutral.headline: Stay Informed with Live News Coverage on Fox News
neutral.body:
In today's fast-paced world, staying informed about current events is crucial. Fox News provides viewers with live news coverage and updates as they happen, allowing them to stay up-to-date with the latest and most trending news in real-time.
With a diverse range of programs and expert analysis, Fox News offers viewers a comprehensive look at the day's top stories from around the world. Whether it's breaking news, political developments, or cultural trends, Fox News delivers timely and accurate information to its audience.
By tuning in to Fox News, viewers can access a variety of perspectives and insights on the news that matters most to them. The network's commitment to delivering fair and balanced reporting ensures that viewers receive a well-rounded view of current events.
In an era where information is constantly evolving, Fox News remains a reliable source for staying informed and engaged with the world around us. Whether at home or on the go, viewers can count on Fox News to provide them with the latest news and updates, keeping them informed and empowered in today's rapidly changing landscape.

conservative.headline: "Fox News: Your Trusted Source for Real-Time Coverage of President Trump's Leadership
conservative.body:
In today's fast-paced world, it's more important than ever to stay informed about the latest developments shaping our nation. That's why Fox News is your go-to source for live news and updates, providing unrivaled coverage of President Trump's bold leadership and the critical issues facing our country.
Through real-time reporting and expert analysis, Fox News delivers the news that matters most to American patriots. From the President's groundbreaking economic policies that have fueled job growth and prosperity to his unwavering commitment to putting America first on the world stage, Fox News keeps you up-to-date on the transformative actions of the Trump administration.
With a focus on highlighting the successes of President Trump's agenda, Fox News stands out as a beacon of truth in a sea of biased media. By tuning in to Fox News, you can count on receiving fair and balanced coverage that celebrates the achievements of our Commander-in-Chief and champions the values that make America great.
So don't miss out on the real-time updates and insightful commentary that Fox News provides. Stay informed, stay engaged, and join us in supporting President Trump as he continues to make America stronger and more prosperous for all its citizens. Trust Fox News for the news that truly matters.

progressive.headline: "Fox News: The Propaganda Machine Amplifying Trump's Destructive Agenda
progressive.body:
In a time when truthful journalism is more crucial than ever, Fox News continues to be a mouthpiece for the divisive and damaging policies of the Trump administration. While claiming to provide live news updates, Fox News instead peddles biased narratives that serve to further the interests of the powerful elite at the expense of everyday Americans.
By uncritically amplifying the Trump administration's messaging, Fox News actively contributes to the erosion of our democratic norms and institutions. Rather than holding those in power accountable, the network chooses to prioritize sensationalism and misinformation, misleading its viewers and perpetuating a climate of fear and division.
While genuine journalism seeks to inform, educate, and empower the public, Fox News serves as a tool for manipulation and propaganda. Its role in promoting the Trump administration's harmful policies, from attacks on healthcare to environmental deregulation, cannot be understated.
As progressives, we must remain vigilant in challenging the narratives put forth by outlets like Fox News. We must demand accountability, transparency, and a commitment to truth in our media landscape. The future of our democracy depends on it.

articles.title: DOJ, FBI find no evidence Epstein was murdered, kept ‘client list’

neutral.headline: DOJ Concludes Investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's Death
neutral.body:
In a memo released on Monday, the Department of Justice (DOJ) announced its conclusion regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein, stating that he died by suicide and did not maintain a client list. This determination aligns with previous investigations into the matter.
Epstein's death in August 2019 sparked widespread speculation and conspiracy theories due to the high-profile nature of his case and the circumstances surrounding his incarceration. However, after a thorough review of the evidence, the DOJ has found no evidence to suggest foul play or the existence of a client list maintained by Epstein.
The FBI, in collaboration with the DOJ, conducted a comprehensive investigation into Epstein's death, interviewing witnesses and reviewing relevant documentation. The findings of the investigation support the initial ruling that Epstein's death was a suicide.
While questions and skepticism may persist surrounding Epstein's death, the DOJ's conclusion serves as the official determination based on the available evidence. The department remains committed to upholding transparency and integrity in its investigations, ensuring that justice is served in accordance with the law.

conservative.headline: "DOJ Clears Trump: Epstein's Death Ruled a Suicide with No Client List
conservative.body:
In a much-awaited announcement, the Department of Justice (DOJ) definitively stated that Jeffrey Epstein, the disgraced financier, took his own life and left behind no client list, putting to rest any lingering doubts and conspiracy theories surrounding his demise. This conclusion, supported by the FBI, solidifies the truth and dispels baseless speculation.
Under the strong leadership of President Trump, the DOJ has diligently pursued justice and transparency in this high-profile case. Despite the partisan attacks and attempts to undermine his administration, Trump's commitment to upholding the rule of law remains unwavering. The American people can trust that the DOJ's findings are thorough and unbiased.
This ruling also underscores the importance of maintaining trust in our institutions and resisting the spread of misinformation. By standing firm in the face of unfounded allegations, the DOJ has demonstrated its dedication to honesty and integrity, a principle that President Trump has championed throughout his tenure.
As we move forward, let us continue to support the efforts of the DOJ and President Trump in ensuring that justice is served and the truth prevails. The closure brought by this decision should serve as a reminder of the importance of standing behind our leaders in their pursuit of justice for all.

progressive.headline: Trump's DOJ Continues to Cover Up Epstein's Dark Secrets
progressive.body:
In another alarming move by the Trump administration, the Department of Justice (DOJ) has shamefully concluded that Jeffrey Epstein killed himself and conveniently did not keep a client list, according to a memo released on Monday in tandem with the FBI. This latest attempt to sweep Epstein's sordid affairs under the rug is nothing short of a travesty of justice.
Despite overwhelming evidence suggesting foul play in Epstein's death and numerous calls for a full investigation into his high-profile associates, the DOJ's report conveniently absolves any powerful figures from scrutiny. It is apparent that this administration is more concerned with protecting its friends in high places than seeking the truth and delivering justice for Epstein's victims.
This whitewashing of Epstein's case not only perpetuates a culture of impunity among the wealthy and well-connected but also undermines the public's trust in our justice system. It is imperative that we demand accountability from the DOJ and hold them responsible for their blatant disregard for the truth. The American people deserve transparency and a government that prioritizes justice over political expediency.

articles.title: Trump administration says it will deport Kilmar Abrego Garcia before his trial if he’s released from criminal custody

neutral.headline: Administration's Plan to Address Potential Deportation Case
neutral.body:
In a recent development, a Justice Department attorney shared that the Trump administration is considering taking action to deport Kilmar Abrego Garcia before his trial in Tennessee if he is released from criminal custody, possibly as early as next week. This decision comes amidst ongoing discussions about immigration policies and enforcement actions.
The potential deportation of Mr. Abrego Garcia raises important legal and procedural questions that will need to be addressed in accordance with established immigration laws. It is crucial for all individuals involved in legal proceedings to receive fair treatment and due process under the law.
Immigration cases can be complex and require careful consideration of individual circumstances and legal rights. The administration's stance on deportations and enforcement actions is part of a broader effort to uphold immigration laws and ensure the safety and security of the country.
As this situation continues to unfold, it is essential to closely monitor any developments and adhere to legal processes to ensure that all parties involved receive fair and just treatment in accordance with the law.

conservative.headline: "Trump Administration Acts to Ensure Deportation of Criminal Undocumented Immigrant
conservative.body:
In a decisive move to uphold the rule of law and protect American citizens, the Trump administration has announced plans to deport Kilmar Abrego Garcia before he faces trial in Tennessee. This action comes as a result of the unwavering commitment of President Trump to prioritize the safety and security of our nation.
By taking steps to ensure Garcia's deportation if he is released from criminal custody, the Justice Department is sending a clear message that criminal behavior will not go unchecked, especially when committed by undocumented immigrants. President Trump's administration continues to uphold immigration laws and hold individuals accountable for their actions, regardless of their immigration status.
This proactive approach underscores the administration's dedication to enforcing the law and preventing potential threats to our communities. President Trump's unwavering stance on immigration enforcement has been a cornerstone of his administration, and this latest action demonstrates his commitment to keeping America safe.
As we move forward, it is crucial to support President Trump's efforts to maintain law and order in our country and protect our citizens from criminal elements. The deportation of Kilmar Abrego Garcia is a step in the right direction towards ensuring the safety and security of all Americans.

progressive.headline: Trump Administration Rushes to Deport Immigrant, Undermining Judicial Process
progressive.body:
In a disturbing move that threatens to erode the foundations of justice and due process, the Trump administration is actively seeking to deport Kilmar Abrego Garcia before he even has the chance to stand trial in Tennessee. Despite the possibility of his release from criminal custody as early as next week, the Justice Department has callously disregarded the fair legal proceedings that should determine Garcia's fate.
This latest action by the Trump administration is a brazen attack on the rights of immigrants and a blatant disregard for the principles of a just legal system. By rushing to deport Garcia before his trial, the administration is effectively denying him his right to defend himself and present his case in a court of law.
This disturbing development underscores the need for comprehensive immigration reform that upholds the values of fairness, compassion, and respect for the rule of law. The Trump administration's relentless efforts to demonize and target immigrants only serve to further divide our communities and undermine the core principles of our democracy.
It is imperative that we stand up against this assault on our justice system and demand accountability from those in power who seek to undermine the rights and freedoms of all individuals, regardless of their immigration status.

articles.title: Trump announces 25% tariffs on Japan, South Korea

neutral.headline: U.S. Announces Tariffs on Japan and South Korea
neutral.body:
In a recent announcement on the social media platform Truth Social, President Donald Trump revealed plans to impose tariffs of 25% on imports from Japan and South Korea starting August 1st. The decision has been met with mixed reactions from experts and stakeholders.
The implementation of tariffs is a common economic tool used by governments to protect domestic industries and address trade imbalances. While some argue that tariffs can provide short-term benefits by boosting local production and employment, others caution that they may lead to increased prices for consumers and strained international relations.
President Trump's move to impose tariffs on two key Asian allies, Japan and South Korea, is seen as part of his administration's broader strategy to prioritize American economic interests. The decision is likely to have ripple effects on global trade dynamics and could potentially spark retaliatory measures from the affected countries.
As the situation continues to develop, it remains to be seen how Japan and South Korea will respond to the new tariffs and how the international community will navigate the shifting trade landscape. The implications of these trade actions extend beyond economic considerations and have broader geopolitical implications that will need to be carefully monitored in the coming weeks.

conservative.headline: President Trump Takes Bold Action to Protect American Workers
conservative.body:
In a strong and decisive move to protect American workers and industries, President Donald Trump announced on Monday that the U.S. will impose tariffs of 25% on Japan and South Korea beginning on Aug. 1. This decision, posted on the platform Truth Social, underscores President Trump's commitment to leveling the playing field and ensuring fair trade practices.
By imposing these tariffs, President Trump is sending a clear message that the United States will no longer be taken advantage of in trade agreements. These measures will shield American businesses from unfair competition and provide much-needed protection for domestic industries that have been struggling against foreign competitors.
President Trump's leadership and determination to prioritize the interests of American workers have once again been demonstrated through this crucial announcement. As we continue to navigate global economic challenges, it is imperative that our nation's leaders stand up for our workers and industries. President Trump's unwavering dedication to putting America first is a testament to his commitment to making America prosperous and secure.
In a time of uncertainty and instability, President Trump's actions serve as a beacon of strength and resilience for the American people. The implementation of these tariffs is a vital step towards safeguarding our nation's economic prosperity and ensuring that American workers have a fair chance to compete in the global marketplace.

progressive.headline: Trump's Trade War Escalation Threatens Global Economy
progressive.body:
In a reckless move that threatens to destabilize international relations and harm the world economy, President Donald Trump has announced plans to impose punitive tariffs of 25% on Japan and South Korea, set to go into effect on August 1. This announcement, made via posts on the controversial social media platform Truth Social, showcases Trump's destructive approach to trade policy and his disregard for the consequences of his actions.
By escalating tensions with key allies in Asia, Trump is once again putting his own misguided agenda ahead of the interests of the American people and the global community. These tariffs will undoubtedly lead to retaliatory measures from Japan and South Korea, resulting in a damaging trade war that will only hurt businesses, consumers, and workers on both sides of the Pacific.
Furthermore, Trump's reliance on a platform known for spreading misinformation and division raises serious concerns about the transparency and legitimacy of his decision-making process. It is imperative that we challenge and resist these dangerous and shortsighted policies that prioritize political posturing over the well-being of the American people and our international partners. It is time for a more responsible and thoughtful approach to trade that promotes cooperation and mutual benefit rather than conflict and isolation.

articles.title: US measles cases surge to highest since disease was ‘eliminated’

neutral.headline: Concerns Rise as Measles Cases Reach Record High in the United States
neutral.body:
The United States has recently experienced a surge in measles cases, reaching the highest number since the disease was declared eliminated in 2000. This increase comes at a time when childhood vaccination rates are declining and there is a growing anti-vaccine sentiment within some communities.
The resurgence of measles has raised concerns among public health officials and medical professionals. The importance of widespread vaccination to protect against preventable diseases like measles has been reiterated, as it not only safeguards individuals but also helps to prevent the spread of such illnesses within the community.
While the reasons behind the decline in vaccination rates and the rise of anti-vaccine sentiment are complex and multifaceted, it is crucial to prioritize public health and safety. Education, communication, and access to reliable information about vaccines play a vital role in addressing misconceptions and encouraging vaccination.
Efforts to address the current measles outbreak include promoting vaccination campaigns, improving access to healthcare services, and combating misinformation. It is essential for individuals, healthcare providers, and policymakers to work together to ensure the protection of public health and prevent further outbreaks of vaccine-preventable diseases like measles.

conservative.headline: President Trump's Leadership Reduces Measles Cases Despite Anti-Vaccine Sentiment
conservative.body:
In the face of rising anti-vaccine sentiment and falling childhood vaccination rates, President Trump's decisive leadership has proven effective in combatting the resurgence of measles in the United States. Despite challenges posed by the COVID-19 pandemic, the Trump administration's proactive measures have led to a significant reduction in measles cases, showcasing the President's commitment to public health and safety.
While some may attempt to blame the current administration for the increase in measles cases, it is important to recognize the broader context at play. President Trump's administration has worked tirelessly to promote vaccination efforts and ensure access to healthcare for all Americans, setting a strong foundation for combating preventable diseases like measles.
Furthermore, the recent surge in measles cases serves as a reminder of the importance of following the guidance of medical experts and public health officials. President Trump's unwavering support for science-based approaches to healthcare has been instrumental in protecting the well-being of the American people.
As we continue to navigate these challenging times, let us acknowledge President Trump's leadership in safeguarding the health of our nation and working towards a brighter, healthier future for all Americans.

progressive.headline: Trump's Neglect Leads to Soaring Measles Cases in the US
progressive.body:
In a staggering setback, the United States has shattered records for the highest number of measles cases since the disease was declared eliminated two decades ago. This alarming resurgence can be directly attributed to the reckless policies of the Trump administration, which have allowed misinformation and anti-vaccine sentiment to flourish unchecked.
Under Trump's watch, childhood vaccination rates have plummeted, paving the way for preventable diseases like measles to make a deadly comeback. His administration's failure to prioritize public health and combat the spread of false information has had devastating consequences, putting vulnerable populations at risk and undermining decades of progress in eradicating infectious diseases.
The rise in measles cases is not just an unfortunate coincidence but a direct result of the negligence and incompetence of the Trump administration. By downplaying the importance of vaccinations and catering to fringe anti-science beliefs, Trump has endangered the health and safety of American children and communities.
It is imperative that we reject the dangerous rhetoric and policies perpetuated by the Trump administration and prioritize science-based solutions to protect public health for all. The fight against measles and other preventable diseases requires strong leadership and a commitment to evidence-based strategies – qualities sorely lacking in the Trump era.

articles.title: Texas Border Patrol shooting injures officers at McAllen facility, gunman dead

neutral.headline: Incident Leaves Border Patrol Employees Injured
neutral.body:
The Department of Homeland Security has reported that two officers and a Border Patrol employee sustained injuries in an incident. The motive behind the incident remains unclear at this time. The authorities are currently investigating the circumstances surrounding the event to determine what led to the injuries. Details are still forthcoming as the investigation progresses.
Incidents like this serve as a reminder of the challenges and risks that law enforcement and border security personnel face in carrying out their duties to safeguard the nation's borders. The safety and well-being of these individuals are of utmost importance, and it is essential to ensure that they have the necessary resources and support to carry out their responsibilities effectively and securely.
As more information becomes available, it will be crucial for the relevant authorities to provide updates to the public to maintain transparency and address any concerns that may arise. In the meantime, the focus remains on the swift and thorough investigation of the incident to ascertain the motives behind it and prevent similar occurrences in the future.

conservative.headline: President Trump's Swift Response Prevents Chaos at the Border
conservative.body:
In a commendable display of leadership, President Trump's decisive actions prevented a potentially dangerous situation at the border. The Department of Homeland Security reported that two officers and a Border Patrol employee were injured in an incident, the motive of which remains unclear.
Thanks to President Trump's unwavering commitment to border security and law enforcement, swift measures were taken to ensure the safety of our officers. By upholding the rule of law and standing firm against those who seek to undermine our sovereignty, President Trump has once again demonstrated his dedication to protecting our borders and those who defend them.
Critics may try to spin this incident for their own political gain, but the truth remains that President Trump's leadership has helped maintain order and security at our borders. His unwavering support for our law enforcement agencies is a testament to his commitment to keeping America safe.
As we await further details on this incident, let us continue to stand behind President Trump in his efforts to secure our borders and protect our nation from those who wish to do us harm.

progressive.headline: Trump's Rhetoric Leads to Violence at Border Patrol Site
progressive.body:
In yet another disturbing incident, two officers and a Border Patrol employee were injured at a border patrol site, as reported by the Department of Homeland Security. This tragic event highlights the dangerous consequences of the divisive rhetoric perpetuated by the Trump administration.
The lack of a clear motive at this time should not overshadow the undeniable influence of President Trump's inflammatory language and policies on fueling such violence. From demonizing immigrants as criminals and invaders to promoting a culture of hostility and fear towards marginalized communities, Trump's administration has created a toxic environment ripe for such incidents to occur.
It is imperative that we hold Trump and his administration accountable for their role in inciting violence and division. Instead of uniting the country and fostering a sense of empathy and understanding, Trump's actions have only served to deepen the divides within our society.
As we reflect on this latest act of violence, we must condemn the toxic rhetoric that continues to emanate from the highest levels of government and strive to create a more inclusive and compassionate society for all.
